com.hybris.cis.common.interceptor

Class MultiTenantServiceInterceptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hybris.cis.common.interceptor.MultiTenantServiceInterceptor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServiceMethodInterceptor<Identifiable,Identifiable>

    public class MultiTenantServiceInterceptor
extends java.lang.Object
implements ServiceMethodInterceptor<Identifiable,Identifiable>
    A helper class that contains functionality common to all tax service implementations such as hiding the tenant from the document id (which is needed for multi-tenant accounts).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MultiTenantServiceInterceptor() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void after(Identifiable response)
      Removes the previously added user id from the order.id.
      void before(ServiceMethodRequest<Identifiable> request)
      Prepends the current user id to the order.id to avoid ID clashes when the same 3rd party account is used with different clients.
      CisExecutionContext getExecutionContext() 
      void setExecutionContext(CisExecutionContext executionContext)
